cgcloud__Promotion_Product_Share__c.name: cgcloud__Promotion_Product_Share__c
cgcloud__Promotion_Product_Share__c.description: This object holds the details of categories that are assigned to a promotion.

cgcloud__Parent_Promotion_Product_Share_.description: Link to the parent promotion link for this record.

cgcloud__Product__c.description: Reference to the Category that's assigned to the promotion.

cgcloud__Promotion__c.description: Reference to the Promotion to which categories are assigned.
